name: Conference Room A
description:
Conference Room A

Our premier meeting space featuring:

  • Seats up to 20 people
  • 4K video conferencing system
  • Interactive whiteboard
  • High-speed WiFi

Perfect for executive meetings and client presentations.

name: Conference Room B
description:
Conference Room B

Mid-size meeting room with modern amenities:

  1. Comfortable seating for 12
  2. Projection system with wireless connectivity
  3. Conference phone with noise cancellation
  4. Climate control

Ideal for team meetings and brainstorming sessions.

name: Training Room
description:
Training Room

Spacious training facility designed for learning:

FeatureDetails
Capacity30 people
LayoutFlexible seating
TechnologySmart board, laptops
CateringCoffee station included

name: Creative Studio
description:
Creative Studio

Open creative workspace with:

  • Standing desks and flexible furniture
  • Large format displays for presentations
  • Art supplies and whiteboards
  • Natural lighting and plants

Code example for booking: studio.book({ date: "2025-01-01", duration: 4 })

name: Phone Booth 1
description:
Phone Booth 1

Private space for confidential calls and focused work.

Features:

  • Soundproof design
  • Comfortable seating
  • Power outlets and USB charging
  • Adjustable lighting

name: Phone Booth 2
description:
Phone Booth 2

Identical to Phone Booth 1, providing additional private workspace when needed.

Perfect for:

  1. Important phone calls
  2. One-on-one meetings
  3. Focused work sessions
  4. Video interviews

name: Executive Boardroom
description:
Executive Boardroom

Luxury boardroom designed for high-level meetings:

  • Premium leather seating for 16 executives
  • 4K presentation displays on all walls
  • Professional audio/video conferencing
  • Climate-controlled environment
  • Executive catering services available

Reserved for C-level meetings and major client presentations. Advanced booking required.

FeatureSpecification
SeatingPremium leather chairs
Display4K multi-screen setup
AudioDolby conference system

name: Video Production Studio
description:
Video Production Studio

Professional-grade studio for multimedia content creation:

Equipment Available

  • 4K cameras with professional lenses
  • Professional lighting rigs
  • Green screen backdrop
  • Audio recording equipment
  • Video editing workstations

Booking Requirements:

  1. 24-hour advance notice
  2. Technical briefing required
  3. Production assistant available on request

// Example booking API
const booking = await studio.reserve({ date: '2025-01-01', duration: 4, equipment: ['camera', 'lighting'] });

name: Collaboration Hub
description:
Collaboration Hub

Dynamic open workspace designed for team collaboration:

Flexible Features

  • Modular furniture that can be reconfigured
  • Multiple whiteboards and flip charts
  • Wireless presentation capabilities
  • Standing desk options
  • Comfortable lounge seating areas

Perfect for agile teams, design thinking sessions, and creative workshops.

Space can be divided into smaller areas using movable partitions.

name: Workshop Room
description:
Workshop Room

Hands-on learning space equipped for practical training:

Equipment TypeDescriptionQuantity
WorkbenchesHeight-adjustable stations10
ToolsComplete toolkit sets20
Safety EquipmentProtective gear and first aidFull set
ProjectorLarge display for demonstrations1

Available Training Programs

  1. Technical skills workshops
  2. Safety training sessions
  3. Equipment operation training
  4. Certification programs

name: Quiet Study Area
description:
Quiet Study Area

Silent workspace for focused individual work:

Study Environment

  • Individual study carrels with privacy screens
  • Noise-canceling design and materials
  • Adjustable LED task lighting
  • Power outlets and USB charging at every seat
  • Climate control for optimal comfort

Silence Policy: This is a no-talking zone. Please use phone booths for calls.

Reserved for deep work, research, and concentration requiring activities.

name: Event Auditorium
description:
Event Auditorium

Grand auditorium space for large-scale events and presentations:

Technical Specifications

FeatureDetails
Seating150 fixed theater-style seats
StageProfessional stage with lighting
Audio/VisualFull PA system with wireless mics
RecordingLive streaming capabilities
AccessibilityWheelchair accessible seating

Event Types

  • Company all-hands meetings
  • Product launches and demos
  • Training seminars and conferences
  • Guest speaker presentations
  • Award ceremonies and celebrations

// Event booking system
await auditorium.book({ type: 'all-hands', attendees: 150, av: true });
